name: places/ChIJlz7iLO1ZwokRLTT-OYpTnvo
formattedAddress: 818 6th Ave 5th Floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 818 6th Ave 5th Floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Sophisticated florist in a vibrant storefront creating unique designs for events & elegant bouquets.

originalText.text:
Great.Freaking.Shop. I needed a very last minute bouquet and the first question she asked me is how much I was looking to spend (gurl read my mind). When I said a relatively conservative answer, she still happily helped us out and even brought us into the back of the store to see all the possible arrangements we could make with her help. Every person at this store was incredibly kind and helpful throughout the whole process, and they created a gorgeous bouquet while I last minute crafted on a card they gave me. I will surely be returning to this flower shop for whatever I need next.

It's not overpriced, I have no idea how these crazy stupid 1 star reviews got on here, I hope they can keep racking up 5 stars because they truly deserve it.

originalText.text: We had the most beautiful Orchard delivered from Angelica Flowers for our living room in November and it's amazing how beautiful she's grown. We just love the quality!  We've seen other flowers they offer and the presentation is gorgeous.  Will definitely order something else from them soon. Would highly recommend!

text.text: We had the most beautiful Orchard delivered from Angelica Flowers for our living room in November and it's amazing how beautiful she's grown. We just love the quality!  We've seen other flowers they offer and the presentation is gorgeous.  Will definitely order something else from them soon. Would highly recommend!

originalText.text: Angelicas flowers is truly the best!! I have no doubt that they surpass any other flowers I've ever purchased! The arrangements are gorgeous and hand made by sweet Angelica herself! The flowers are only the best quality! I'm talking we got married Dec 15 and the arrangements were still great at Christmas dinner as our center pieces! Almost clear to the new year! We were so impressed with the amount of care and dedication the whole staff put into making our special day perfect! 5 star top notch service and quality! Love this place!

originalText.text: Great store and a lovely selection of flowers they have, been going there and ordering flowers from them especially the calla lillies. I guess it maybe one of those day I dont know but I ask for a simple arrangement nothing to crazy, and I got shot down like the price was to low,  aboutva month ago I asked for the same type of arrangement price and got a beautiful arrangement nothing g big which that was fine, but this time it was sort of a problem..  probably was because of it being mothers day tomorrow... but its cool
